deeprules.survival.cnf._params
==============================

.. py:module:: deeprules.survival.cnf._params


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   deeprules.survival.cnf._params.AlgorithmParams


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: AlgorithmParams

   Bases: :py:obj:`TypedDict`


   dict() -> new empty dictionary
   dict(mapping) -> new dictionary initialized from a mapping object's
       (key, value) pairs
   dict(iterable) -> new dictionary initialized as if via:
       d = {}
       for k, v in iterable:
           d[k] = v
   dict(**kwargs) -> new dictionary initialized with the name=value pairs
       in the keyword argument list.  For example:  dict(one=1, two=2)


   .. py:attribute:: min_cov
      :type:  int


   .. py:attribute:: max_uncovered_fraction
      :type:  float


   .. py:attribute:: max_conjunction_length
      :type:  int


   .. py:attribute:: max_layers_count
      :type:  int


   .. py:attribute:: enable_pruning
      :type:  bool


   .. py:attribute:: survival_time_attr
      :type:  str
      :value: 'survival_time'



   .. py:attribute:: enable_attributes_conditions
      :type:  bool


   .. py:attribute:: enable_negations
      :type:  bool
